title: EDA on basic data and LGB (in progress)
description: General informationThis kernel is dedicated to EDA of Google Analytics Customer Revenue Prediction  competition as well as feature engineering. For now basic data is used and not data from BigQuery. In this dataset we can see customers which went to Google Merchandise Store, info about them and their transactions. We need to predict the natural log of the sum of all transactions per user. A continuation of this kernel can be found in this one it has more features, CV calculation and other things.
